column2: Strider||Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
Cannot Run||This unit cannot run and will only move at walking pace.
Ignore Ground Type||Speed penalties caused by the terrain are ignored by this unit. - NOT WH
All Ranks Fire||All ranks can fire if using a weapon that only allows 1 rank to do so. - NOT WH
Campaign Stealth||This unit can move around the campaign map without being seen. - NOT WH
Charge Defence vs. Large||When bracing, this unit negates the [[img:icon_charge]][[/img]]charge bonus of any large attacker.
Perfect Vigour||Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.
Fire Whilst Moving||This unit can fire while on the move.
Mighty Knockback||This unit causes extra damage when it knocks enemies back. - NOT WH
Expert Charge Defence||When bracing, this unit negates the [[img:icon_charge]][[/img]]charge bonus of any attacker.

Construct||This unit is an animated construct (does not rout, is immune to terror, becomes unstable when [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]{{tr:morale}} is low). Necrotects can push it to its full combat potential and restore it in battle.
Impetuous||This unit gets an extra [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership bonus when eager. - NOT WH
Rampage||When this unit gets hurt it may go on a rampage against nearby enemy units, attacking the closest one and ignoring any orders given.
Berserk||This unit can go berserk during the battle. This makes them uncontrollable, they will automatically attack nearby enemies. - NOT WH
Unbreakable||This unit does not suffer any form of [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership loss and will never rout.
Snipe||This unit remains hidden while firing.
Stalk||This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
Formation Attack||The unit will try to stay in formation when in melee. - NOT WH
Causes Terror||This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
Resistant to Cold||This unit tires less quickly in snow.
Immune to Psychology||The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).
Disciplined||This unit does not suffer a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership penalty when the [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord dies. It can also rally after routing more often. - NOT WH
Hide (forest)||This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
Causes Fear||This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
Strong Vigour||This unit's vigour is less affected by fatiguing actions, such as combat.
Hide (grass)||This unit can hide in long grass until enemy units get too close. - NOT WH
Resistant to Heat||This unit tires less quickly in the desert.
Unspottable||If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.
Hide (buildings)||This unit can hide in buildings until enemy units get too close. - NOT WH
Hide (scrub & forest)||This unit can hide in scrub and forest until enemy units get too close. - NOT WH
Scare (horses)||This unit gives a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership penalty to enemy horses. - NOT WH

Encourage||This unit provides a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
Expendable||Witnessing friendly expendable units rout does not reduce other units' [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership, unless they are themselves expendable.
Parthian Shot||This unit can fire all around and not just in-front of itself. - NOT WH
Immune to Fear||This unit is immune to the fear effects of scary units.
